chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So welcome to Spring 2019 Machine Learning for Healthcare.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: My name is David Sontag.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I'm a professor in computer science.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Also I'm in the Institute for Medical Engineering and Science.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: My co-instructor today will be Pete Solvets, who I'll introduce more towards the end of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: today's lecture, along with the rest of the course staff.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So the problem.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The problem is that healthcare in the United States costs too much.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Currently we're spending $3 trillion a year, and we're not even necessarily doing a very

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: good job.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Patients who have chronic disease often find that these chronic diseases are diagnosed

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: late, they're often not managed well, and that happens even in a country with some of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the world's best clinicians.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Moreover, medical errors are happening all of the time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Errors that, if caught, would have prevented needless deaths, needless worsening of disease,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and more.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And healthcare impacts all of us.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So I imagine that almost everyone here in this room have had a family member, a loved

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: one, a dear friend, or even themselves suffer from a health condition which impacts your

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: quality of life, which has affected your work, your studies, and possibly has led to a needless

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: death.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so the question that we're asking in this course today is how can we use machine learning

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: artificial intelligence as one piece of a bigger puzzle to try to transform healthcare?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So all of us have some personal stories.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I myself have personal stories that have led me to be interested in this area.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: My grandfather, who had Alzheimer's disease, was diagnosed quite late in his Alzheimer's

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There aren't good treatments today for Alzheimer's, and so it's not that I would have expected

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the outcome to be different, but had he been diagnosed earlier, our family would have recognized

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that many of the erratic things that he was doing towards the later years of his life

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: were due to this disease and not due to some other reason.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: My mother, who had multiple myeloma, a blood cancer, who was diagnosed four years ago,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: or five years ago now, never started treatment for her cancer before she died two years ago,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: or one year ago.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now why did she die?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Well, it was believed that her cancer was still in its very early stages.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Her blood markers that were used to track the progress of the cancer put her in a low-risk category.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: She didn't yet have visible complications of the disease that would, according to today's

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: standard guidelines, require treatment to be initiated.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: As a result, the belief was the best strategy was to wait and see.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But unbeknownst to her and to my family, her blood cancer, which was caused by light

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: chains which were accumulating, ended up leading to organ damage.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In this case, the light chains were accumulating in her heart, and she died of heart failure.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Had we recognized that her disease was further along, she might have initiated treatment,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and there are now over 20 treatments for multiple myeloma which are believed to have life-lengthening

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: effect.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I can give you four or five other stories from my own personal family and my friends

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: where similar things have happened, and I have no doubt that all of you have as well.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So what can we do about it is the question that we want to try to understand in today's

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: course.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And don't get me wrong, machine learning, artificial intelligence will only be one piece

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of the puzzle.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are so many other systematic changes that we're going to have to make into our

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: health care system.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But let's try to understand what those AI elements might be.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So let's start in today's lecture by giving a bit of a background on artificial intelligence

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and machine learning health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And I'll tell you why I think the time is right now in 2019 to really start to make

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: a big dent at this problem.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Then I'll give you a few examples of how machine learning is likely to transform health care

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: over the next decade.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Of course, we're just guessing, but this is really guided by the latest and greatest in

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: research.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then we'll close today's lecture with an overview of what's different, what's unique

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: about machine learning health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: All of you have taken some machine learning course in the past, and so you know the basics

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of supervised prediction.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Many of you have studied things like clustering.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And you're certainly paying attention to the news where you see news every single day about

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Google, Facebook, Microsoft's latest advances in speech recognition, computer vision, and

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: so on.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So what's really different about trying to apply these techniques in the health care

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: domain?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The answer is that there's a huge amount of difference, and there are a lot of subtleties

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to doing machine learning right here.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And we'll talk about that throughout the whole entire semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So to begin, this isn't a new field.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Artificial intelligence and medicine goes back to the 1970s or sometime even in the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One of the earliest examples of trying to use artificial intelligence for diagnosis

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: was this myosin system developed at Stanford, where the goal was to try to identify bacteria

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that might cause infection and then to try to guide what would be the appropriate therapy

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for that bacteria.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now, it was found that this algorithm, this simple AI algorithm, was able to propose a

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: good therapy in 69% of cases, which at the time was better than the best or very good

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: infectious disease experts.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now it also had some other elements of it which were quite interesting.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So those of you who've been following the latest in chat bots might find this little

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: present.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So there's a dialogue interface where the computer says, I am ready.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The clinician responds, this is a 26-year-old male patient.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The computer tests its understanding of what's going on.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It says the age of the patient is 26.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The sex of the patient is male.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The clinician writes, five days ago, he had respiratory tract infections.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The computer asks, what is his name?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Joe.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The computer responds, my understanding is the name of the patient is Joe.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Respiratory tract is one of the symptoms the patient had.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Then the clinician writes, a couple of days before the admission, he had malaise, which

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is general tiredness.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The computer responds, please give me a date of admission.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The clinician responds, March 12, 1979.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the computer again confirmed that it's understood appropriately.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this is the preface to the later diagnostic stages.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So the ideas of how AI can really impact medicine have been around a long time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Yet these algorithms, which have been shown to be very effective, even going back to the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: 70s, didn't translate into clinical care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: A second example, also equally impressive in its nature, was work from the 1980s in

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Pittsburgh developing what's known as the Internist-1, or quick medical reference system.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This was now used not for infectious diseases, but for primary care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Here one might ask, how can we try to do diagnosis at a much larger scale, where patients might

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: come in with one of hundreds of different diseases and could report thousands of different

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: symptoms, each one giving you some view, noisy view, into what might be going on with the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: patient's health.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And at a high level, they modeled this as something like a Bayesian network.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It wasn't strictly a Bayesian network.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It was a bit more heuristic at the time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It was later developed to be so.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But at a high level, there were a number of latent variables, or hidden variables, corresponding

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to different diseases the patient might have, like flu, or pneumonia, or diabetes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then there were a number of variables on the very bottom, which were symptoms, which

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are all binary.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So the diseases are either on or off.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And here the symptoms are either present or not.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And these symptoms could include things like fatigue or cough.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They could also be things that result from laboratory test results, like a high value

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of hemoglobin A1c.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this algorithm would then take this model, take the symptoms that were reported for the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: patient, and try to do reasoning over what actually might be going on with that patient

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to figure out what the differential diagnosis is.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There were over 40,000 edges connecting diseases to symptoms that those diseases were believed

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to have caused.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this knowledge base, which was probabilistic in nature because it captured the idea that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: some symptoms would only occur with some probability for a disease, took over 15 person

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: years to elicit from a large medical team.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So it was a lot of effort.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And even in going forward to today's time, there have been few similar efforts at a scale

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: as impressive as this one.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But again, what happened?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: These algorithms are not being used anywhere today in our clinical workflows.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the challenges that have prevented them from being used today are numerous.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But I used a word in my explanation which should really hint at it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I used the word clinical workflow.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this, I think, is one of the biggest challenges, which is that the algorithms were designed

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to solve narrow problems.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They weren't necessarily even the most important problems because clinicians generally do a

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: very good job at diagnosis.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there was a big gap between the input that they expected and the current clinical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: workflows.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So imagine that you have now a mainframe computer.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This was the 80s.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And you have a clinician who has to talk to the patient, get some information, go back

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to the computer, type in a structured data, the symptoms that the patient's reporting,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: get information back from the computer, and iterate.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: As you can imagine, that takes a lot of time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And time is money.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And unfortunately, it prevents it from being used.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Moreover, despite the fact that it took a lot of effort to use when outside of existing

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: clinical workflows, these systems were also really difficult to maintain.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So I talked about how this was elicited from 15-person years of work.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There was no machine learning here.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It was called artificial intelligence because one tries to reason in an artificial way like

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: humans might.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But there was no learning from data in this.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so what that means is if you then go to a new place, let's say this was developed

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in Pittsburgh, and now you go to Los Angeles or to Beijing or to London, and you want to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: apply the same algorithms, you suddenly have to re-derive parts of this model from scratch.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, the prior probabilities of the diseases are going to be very different depending

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: on where you are in the world.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now you might want to go to a different domain outside of primary care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And again, one has to spend a huge amount of effort to derive such models.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: As new medicine discoveries are made, one has to, again, update these models.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This has been a huge blocker to deployment.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I'll move forward to one more example, also from the 1980s.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This is now for a different type of question, not one of how do you do diagnosis, but how

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: do you actually do discovery?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this is an example from Stanford.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it was a really interesting case where one took a data-driven approach to try to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: make medical discoveries.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There was a database of what's called a disease registry from patients with rheumatoid arthritis,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: which is a chronic disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's an autoimmune condition, where for each patient over a series of different visits,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: one would record, for example, here it shows this is visit number one.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The date was January 17, 1979.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The knee pain, the patient's knee pain was reported as severe.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The fatigue was moderate.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Temperature was 38.5 Celsius.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The diagnosis for this patient was actually a different autoimmune condition called systemic

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: lupus.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We have some laboratory test values for their creatinine and blood urated nitrogen.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And we know something about their medication.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In this case, they were on prednisone, a steroid.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one has this data at every point in time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This is recorded, almost certainly was recorded on paper.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then later, these were collected into a computer format.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But then it provides the possibility to ask questions and make new discoveries.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, in this work, there was a discovery module, which would make causal

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: hypotheses about what aspects might cause other aspects.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It would then do some basic statistics to check about the statistical validity of those

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: causal hypotheses.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It would then present those to a domain expert to try to check off, does this make sense

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: or not?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For those that are accepted, it then uses that knowledge that was just learned to iterate

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to try to make new discoveries.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one of the main findings from this paper was that prednisone elevates cholesterol.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that was published in the Annals of Internal Medicine in 1986.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So these are all very early examples of data-driven approaches to improve both medicine and health

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now flip forward to the 1990s.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Neural networks started to become popular.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Not quite the neural networks that we're familiar with in today's day and age, but nonetheless,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: they shared very much of the same elements.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So just in 1990, there were 88 published studies using neural networks for various different

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: medical problems.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One of the things that really differentiated those approaches to what we see in today's

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: landscape is that the number of features were very small.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So usually, features which were similar to what I showed you in the previous slide.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So structured data that was manually curated for the purpose of using in machine learning.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there was nothing automatic about this.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So one would have to have assistants gather the data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And because of that, typically, there were very small number of samples for each study

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that were used in machine learning.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now these models, although very effective, and I'll show you some examples in the next

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: slide, also suffered from the same challenges I mentioned earlier.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They didn't fit well into clinical workflows.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It was hard to get enough training data because of the manual efforts involved.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And what the community found, even in the early 1990s, is that these algorithms did

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: not generalize well.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you went through this huge effort of collecting training data, learning your model, and validating

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: your model at one institution, and you then take it to a different one, it just works

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: much worse.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: OK?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that really prevented translation of these technologies into clinical practice.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So what were these different domains that were studied?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Well, here are a few examples.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's a bit small, so I'll read it out to you.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Studied in breast cancer, myocardial infarction, heart attack, lower back pain, used to predict

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: psychiatric length of stay for inpatient, skin tumors, head injuries, prediction of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: dementia, understanding progression of diabetes, and a variety of other problems, which, again,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are of the nature that we see about, we read about in the news today in modern attempts

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to apply machine learning in health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Number of training examples, as mentioned, were very few, ranging from 39 to, in some

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: cases, 3,000.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Those are individuals, humans.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the networks, the neural networks, they weren't completely shallow, but they weren't

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: very deep either.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So these were the architectures.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They might be 60 neurons, and then seven, and then six, for example, in terms of each

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of the layers of the neural network.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: By the way, that sort of makes sense, given the type of data that was fed into it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So none of this is new in terms of the goals.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So what's changed?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Why do I think that, despite the fact that we've had what could arguably be called a

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: failure for the last 30 or 40 years, that we might actually have some chances of succeeding

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: now?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the big differentiator, what I'll call now the opportunity, is data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So whereas in the past, much of the work in artificial intelligence in medicine was not

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: data-driven, it was based on trying to elicit as much domain knowledge as one can from clinical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: domain experts, in some cases gathering a little bit of data, today we have an amazing

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: opportunity because of the prevalence of electronic medical records, both in the United States

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and elsewhere.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now, here in the United States, for example, the story wasn't that way even back in 2008,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: when the adoption of electronic medical records was under 10% across the US.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But then there was an economic disaster in the US.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And as part of the economic stimulus package, which President Obama initiated, there was

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: something like $30 billion allocated to hospitals purchasing electronic medical records.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this is already a first example that we see of policy being really influential to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: create the, to open the stage to the types of work that we're going to be able to do

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in this course today.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So money was made available as incentives for hospitals to purchase electronic medical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: records.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And as a result, the adoption increased dramatically.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This is a really old number from 2015 of 84% of hospitals.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And now today, it's actually much larger.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So data is being collected in electronic form.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that presents an opportunity to try to do research on it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It presents an opportunity to do machine learning on it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it presents an opportunity to start to deploy machine learning algorithms, where

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: rather than having to manually input data for a patient, we can just draw it automatically

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: from data that's already available in electronic form.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so there are a number of data sets that have been made available for research and

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: development in this space.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Here at MIT, there has been a major effort pioneered by Professor Roger Marks in the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: EECS and Institute for Medical Engineering departments to create what's known as the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Physionet or MIMIC databases.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: MIMIC contains data from over 40,000 patients in intensive care units.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it's very rich data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It contains basically everything that's being collected in the intensive care unit, everything

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: from notes that are written by both nurses and by attendings to vital signs that are

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: being collected by monitors that are attached to patients, collecting their blood pressure,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: saturation, heart rate, and so on, to imaging data, to blood test results as they're made

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: available, and outcomes, and of course, also medications that are being prescribed as it

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: goes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so this is a wealth of data that now one could use to try to study, at least study

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in a very narrow setting of the intensive care unit, how machine learning could be used

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in that location.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And I don't want to underemphasize the importance of this database, both to this course and

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to the broader field.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This is really the only publicly available electronic medical record data set of any

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: reasonable size in the whole world.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it was created here at MIT.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And we'll be using it extensively in our homework assignments as a result.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are other data sets that aren't publicly available, but which have been gathered by

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: industry.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One prime example is the Truven market scan database, which was created by a company called

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Truven, which was later acquired by IBM, as I'll tell you about more in a few minutes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now this data, and there are many competing companies that have similar data sets, is

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: created not from electronic medical records, but rather from, typically it's created from

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: insurance claims.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So every time you go to see a doctor, there's usually some record of that that is associated

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to the billing of that visit.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So your provider will send a bill to your health insurance saying basically what happened,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: so what procedures were performed, providing diagnoses that are used to justify the cost

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of those procedures and tests.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And from that data, you now get a holistic view, a longitudinal view, of what's happened

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to that patient's health.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then there is a lot of money that passes behind the scenes between insurers and hospitals

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to corporate companies such as Truven, which collect that data and then resell it for research

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: purposes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one of the biggest purchasers of data like this is the pharmaceutical industry.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this data, unfortunately, is not usually publicly available.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that's actually a big problem, both in the US and elsewhere.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's a big obstacle to research in this field that only people who have millions of dollars

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to pay for it really get access to it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it's something that I'm going to return to throughout the semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's again something where I think policy can make a big difference.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But luckily, here at MIT, the story is going to be a bit different.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So thanks to the MIT IBM Watson AI Lab, MIT has a close relationship with IBM.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And fingers crossed, it looks like we'll get access to this database for our homework and

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: projects for this semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now there are a lot of other initiatives that are creating large data sets.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: A really important example here in the US is President Obama's Precision Medicine Initiative,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: which has since been renamed to the All of Us Initiative.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this initiative is creating a data set of one million patients drawn in a representative

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: manner from across the United States to capture patients, both poor and rich, patients who

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are healthy and have chronic disease, with the goal of trying to create a research database

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: where all of us and other people, both inside and outside the US, could do research to make

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: medical discoveries.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this will include data such as data from a baseline health exam where the typical vitals

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are taken, blood is drawn.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It'll combine data of the previous two types I've mentioned, including both data from electronic

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: medical records and health insurance claims.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then a lot of this work is also happening here in Boston.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So right across the street at the Broad Institute, there's a team which is creating all of the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: software infrastructure to accommodate this data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there are a large number of accruement sites here in the broader Boston area where

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: patients or any one of you really could go and volunteer to be part of the study.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I just got a letter in the mail last week inviting me to go, and I was really excited

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to see that.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So all sorts of different data is being created as a result of these trends that I've been

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: mentioning.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it ranges from unstructured data like clinical notes to imaging, lab tests, vital

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: signs.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Nowadays, what we used to think about just as clinical data now has started to really

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: come to have a very tight tie to what we think about as biological data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So data from genomics and proteomics is starting to play a major role in both clinical research

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and clinical practice.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Of course, not everything that we traditionally think about health care data, there are also

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: some nontraditional sources of views on health.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, social media is an interesting way of thinking through both psychiatric disorders

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: where many of us will post things on Facebook and other places about our mental health,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: which give a lens on our mental health.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Your phone, which is tracking your activity, will give us a view on how active we are.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It might help us diagnose early a variety of conditions as well that I'll mention later.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this whole theme right now is about what's changed since the previous approaches at AI

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: medicine.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I've just talked about data, but data alone is not nearly enough.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The other major change is that there has been decades worth of work on standardizing health

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, when I mentioned to you that when you go to a doctor's office and they

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: send a bill, that bill is associated with a diagnosis.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that diagnosis is coded in a system called ICD-9 or ICD-10, which is a standardized system

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: where for many, not all, but many diseases, there is a corresponding code associated with

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: ICD-10, which was recently rolled out nationwide about a year ago, is much more detailed than

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the previous coding system, includes some interesting categories.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, bitten by a turtle has a code for it, bitten by a sea lion, struck by a

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: macaw.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So it's starting to get really detailed here, which has its benefits and its disadvantages

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: when it comes to research using that data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But certainly, we can do more with detailed data than we could with less detailed data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Laboratory test results are standardized using a system called LOINC here in the United States.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Again, every lab test order has an associated code for it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I just want to point out briefly that the values associated with those lab tests are

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: less standardized.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Pharmacy, national drug codes should be very familiar to you.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you take any medication that you've been prescribed and you look carefully, you'll

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: see a number on it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: MDC 0015347911, that number is unique to that medication.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In fact, it's even unique to the brand of that medication.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there's an associated taxonomy with it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so one can really understand in a very structured way what medications a patient

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is on and how those medications relate to one another.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: A lot of medical data is found not in the structured form, but in free text, in notes

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: written by doctors.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And these notes have often lots of mentions of symptoms and conditions in them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one can try to standardize those by mapping them to what's called the Unified Medical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Language System, which is an ontology with millions of different medical concepts in

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So I'm not going to go too much more into these.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They'll be the subject of much discussion in this semester, but particularly in the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: next two lectures by Pete.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But I want to talk very briefly about what you can do once you have a standardized vocabulary.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So one thing you can do is you could build APIs, or application programming interfaces,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for now sending that data from place to place.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And FHIR, F-H-I-R, is a new standard which has widespread adoption now here in the United

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: States for hospitals to provide data both to downstream clinical purposes, but also

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: directly to patients.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And in this standard, it will use many of the vocabularies I mentioned to you in the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: previous slides to encode diagnoses, medications, allergies, problems, and even financial aspects

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that are relevant to the care of this patient.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For those of you who have an Apple phone, for example, if you open up Apple Health Records,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: it makes use of this standard to receive data from over 50 different hospitals.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And you should expect to see many competitors to them in the future because of the fact

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that it's now an open standard.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now other types of data, like the health insurance claims I mentioned earlier, is often encoded

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in a slightly different data model.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One which my lab works quite a bit with is called OMOP.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it's being maintained by a nonprofit organization called the Observational Health Data Sciences

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Initiative, Odyssey.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this common data model gives a standard way of taking data from an institution, which

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: might have its own intricacies, and really mapping it to this common language so that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: if you write a machine learning algorithm once, and that machine learning algorithm

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: reads in data in this format, you could then apply it somewhere else very easily.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the importance of these standards really can't be understated.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The importance for translating what we're doing in this class into clinical practice.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so we'll be returning to these things throughout the semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So we've talked about data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We've talked about standards.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the third wheel is breakthroughs in machine learning.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this should be no surprise to anyone in this room.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We've been seeing time and time again over the last five years benchmark after benchmark

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: being improved upon and human performance beaten by state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Here I'm just showing you a figure that I imagine many of you have seen on the error

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: rates on the ImageNet competition for object recognition.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The error rates in 2011 were 25%.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And even just a few years ago, it already surpassed human level to under 5%.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now, the changes that have led to those advances in object recognition are going to have some

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: parallels in health care, but only up to some point.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, there was big data, large training sets that were critical for this.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There were algorithmic advances, in particular in convolutional neural networks that played

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: a huge role.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there was open source software that was created, things like TensorFlow and PyTorch,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: which allow a researcher or industry worker in one place to very, very quickly build upon

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: successes from other researchers in other places and then release the code so that one

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: can really accelerate the rate of progress in this field.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now in terms of those algorithmic advances that have made a big difference, the ones

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that I would really like to point out because of their relevance to this course are learning

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: with high dimensional features.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this was really the advances in the early 2000s, for example, in support vector machines

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and learning with L1 regularization as a type of sparsity.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then more recently in the last six years on stochastic gradient descent-like methods

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for very rapidly solving these convex optimization problems.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: That will play a huge role in what we'll be doing in this course.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In the last few years, there have been a huge amount of progress in unsupervised and semi-supervised

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: learning algorithms.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And as I'll tell you about much later, one of the major challenges in health care is

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that despite the fact that we have a large amount of data, we have very little labeled

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so these semi-supervised learning algorithms are going to play a major role in being able

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to really take advantage of the data that we do have.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then of course the modern deep learning algorithms, convolutional neural networks,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: recurrent neural networks, and ways of trying to train them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So those played a major role in the advances in the tech industry.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And to some extent, they'll play a major role in health care as well.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And I'll point out a few examples of that in the rest of today's lecture.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So all of this coming together, the data availability, the advances in other fields of machine learning,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and the huge amount of potential financial gain in health care and the potential social

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: impact it could have has not gone unnoticed.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there's a huge amount of industry interest in this field.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: These are just some examples from names I think many of you are familiar with, like

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: DeepMind Health and IBM Watson, to startup companies like Bay Labs and PathAI, which

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is here in Boston, all of which are really trying to build the next generation of tools

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for health care now based on machine learning algorithms.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There's been billions of dollars of funding in the recent quarters towards digital health

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: efforts with hundreds of different startups that are focused specifically on using artificial

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: intelligence in health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the recognition that data is so essential to this process has led to an all-out purchasing

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: effort to try to get as much of that data as you can.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, IBM purchased a company called Merge, which made medical imaging software

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and thus had accumulated a large amount of medical imaging data for $1 billion in 2015.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They purchased Truven for $2.6 billion in 2016.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Flatiron Health, which is a company in New York City focused on oncology, was purchased

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for almost $2 billion by Roche, a pharmaceutical company, just last year.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there's several more of these industry moves.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And again, I'm just trying to get you thinking about what it really takes in this field.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And access to data is actually a really important one, obviously.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So let's now move on to some examples of how machine learning will transform health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: To begin with, I want to really lay out the landscape here and define some language.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are a number of different players when it comes to the health care space.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are us, patients, consumers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are the doctors that we go to, which you could think about as providers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But of course, they're not just doctors.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They're also nurses and community health workers and so on.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are payers, where these edges are really showing relationships between the different

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: players.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So our consumers, we often, either from our job or directly from us, we will pay premiums

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for a health insurance company to a health insurance company.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then that health insurance company is responsible for payments to the providers

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to provide services to us patients.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now here in the US, the payers are both commercial and governmental.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So many of you will know companies like Cigna or Aetna or Blue Cross, which are commercial

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: providers of health insurance.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But there are also governmental ones.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, the Veterans Health Administration runs one of the biggest health organizations

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in the United States, servicing our veterans, people who retired from the Department of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Defense, which has one of the second biggest health systems, the Defense Health Agency.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that is an organization where both of those organizations, where both the payer

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and the provider really won.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The Center for Medicare and Medicaid Services here in the US provides health insurance for

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: all retirees in the United States.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And also Medicaid, which is run at a state level, provides health insurance to a variety

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of individuals who would otherwise have difficulty purchasing or obtaining their own health insurance.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And those are examples of state-run or federally-run health insurance agencies.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then internationally, sometimes the lines are even more blurred.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So of course, in places like the United Kingdom, where you have a government-run health system,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the National Health Service, you have the same system both paying for and providing

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the services.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now the reason why this is really important for us to think about already in lecture one

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is because what's so essential about this field is figuring out where are the knobs

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that you can turn to try to improve health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Where can we deploy machine learning algorithms within health care?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so some algorithms are going to be better run by providers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Others are going to be better run by payers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Others are going to be directly provided to patients, and some all of the above.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We also have to think about industrial questions in terms of what is it going to take to develop

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: a new product?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Who will pay for this product?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Which is, again, an important question when it comes to deploying algorithms here.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So I'll run through a couple of very high-level examples driven from my own work focused on

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the provider space, and then I'll bump up to talk a bit more broadly.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for the last seven or eight years, I've been doing a lot of work in collaboration

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: with Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center across the river with their emergency department.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The emergency department is a really interesting clinical setting because you have a very short

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: period of time from when a patient comes into the hospital to diagnose what's going on with

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: them, to initiate therapy, and then to decide what to do next.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Do you keep them in the hospital?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Do you send them home?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For each one of those things, what should the most immediate actions be?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And at least here in the US, we're always understaffed.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So we've got limited resources and very critical decisions to make.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this is one example of a setting where algorithms that are running behind the scenes

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: could potentially really help with some of the challenges I mentioned earlier.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, one can imagine an algorithm which builds on techniques like what I mentioned

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to you for Internist 1 or quick medical reference, try to reason about what's going on with the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: patient based on the data that's available for the patient, the symptoms.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But the modern view of this shouldn't, of course, use binary indicators of each symptom,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: which have to be entered in manually.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But rather, all of these things should be automatically extracted from the electronic

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: medical record or listed as necessary.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And then if one could reason about what's going on with the patient, we wouldn't necessarily

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: want to use it for diagnosis, although in some cases, you might use it for earlier diagnosis.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But it could also be used for a number of other more subtle interventions.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, better triage to figure out which patients need to be seen first, early detection

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of adverse events or recognition that there might be some unusual actions, which might

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: actually be medical errors that you want to surface now and draw attention to.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now you could also use this understanding of what's going on with the patient to change

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the way that clinicians interact with patient data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, one can try to propagate best practices by surfacing clinical decision support,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: automatically triggering this clinical decision support for patients that you think it might

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: be irrelevant for.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And here's one example where it says, the ED dashboard, the emergency department dashboard,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: decision support algorithms have determined this patient may be eligible for the atrius

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: cellulitis pathway.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Cellulitis is often caused by infections.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Please choose from one of the options.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Enroll in the pathway, decline.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And if you decline, you must include a comment for the reviewers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now if you clicked on enroll in the pathway, at that moment, machine learning disappears.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Rather, there is a standardized process.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's an algorithm, but it's a deterministic algorithm for how patients with cellulitis

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: should be properly managed, diagnosed, and treated.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: That algorithm comes from best practices, comes from clinicians coming together, analyzing

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: past data, understanding what would be good ways to treat patients of this type, and then

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: formalizing that in a document.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The challenge is that there might be hundreds or even thousands of these best practices.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And in an academic medical center where you have patients coming, where you have medical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: students or residents who are very quickly rotating through the system and thus may not

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: be familiar with what are the most appropriate clinical guidelines to use for any one patient

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in this institution, or if you go to a rural site where this academic nature of thinking

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: through what the right clinical guidelines are is a little bit less of the mainstream

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: everyday activity, the question of which one to use when is very challenging.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so that's where the machine learning algorithms can come in.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: By reasoning about what's going on with the patient, you might have a good guess of what

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: might be appropriate for this patient.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And you use that to automatically surface the right clinical decision support trigger.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Another example is by just trying to anticipate clinician needs.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, if you think that this patient might be coming in for a psychiatric condition,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: or maybe you recognize that the patient came in and that triage was complaining of chest

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: pain, then there might be a psych order set, which includes laboratory test results that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are relevant for psychiatric patients, or a chest pain order set, which includes both

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: laboratory tests and interventions like aspirin that might be suggested.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now these are also examples where these order sets are not created by machine learning algorithms,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: although that's something we could discuss later in the semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Rather they're standardized, but the goal of the machine learning algorithm is just

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to figure out which ones to show when directly to the clinicians.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I'm showing you these examples to try to point out that diagnosis isn't the whole story.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Thinking through what are the more subtle interventions we can do with machine learning

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and AI in health care is going to be really important to having the impact that it could

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: have.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So other examples, now a bit more in the diagnosis style, are reducing the need for specialist

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: consults.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So you might have a patient come in, and it might be really quick to get the patient in

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: front of an x-ray to do a chest x-ray.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
