chunks.text: But then finding the radiologist to review that x-ray could take a lot of time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And in some places, radiologist consults could take days, depending on the urgency of the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: condition.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this is an area where data is quite standardized.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In fact, MIT just released last week a data set of 300,000 chest x-rays with associated

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: labels on them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one could try to ask the question of, could we build machine learning algorithms

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: using the convolutional neural network type techniques that we've seen play a big role

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in object recognition to try to understand what's going on with this patient?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, in this case, the prediction is that the patient has pneumonia from this

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: chest x-ray.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And using those systems, it could help both reduce the load of radiology consults, and

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: it could allow us to really translate these algorithms to settings which might be much

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: more resource poor, for example, in developing nations.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now the same sorts of techniques can be used for other data modalities.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this is an example of data that could be obtained from an EKG.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And from looking at this EKG, one can try to predict, does the patient have a heart

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: condition such as an arrhythmia?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now these types of data used to just be obtained when you go to a doctor's office.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But today, they're available to all of us.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, in Apple's most recent watch that was released, it has a single lead EKG

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: built into it, which can attempt to predict if a patient has arrhythmia or not.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There are a lot of subtleties, of course, around what it took to get regulatory approval

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for that, which we'll be discussing later in the semester, and how one safely deploys

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: such algorithms directly to consumers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there, there are a variety of techniques that could be used.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In a few lectures, I'll talk to you about techniques from the 80s and 90s, which were

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: based on signal processing, trying to detect where are the peaks of this signal, look at

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the distance between peaks.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: More recently, because of the large wealth of data that's available, we've been using

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: convolutional neural network-based approaches to try to understand this data and predict

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: from it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Yet another example from the ER really has to do with not how do we care for the patient

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: today, but how do we get better data, which will then result in taking better care of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the patient tomorrow.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so one example of that, which my group deployed at Bethesda Odecon, and it's still

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: running there in the emergency department, has to do with getting higher quality chief

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: complaints.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The chief complaint is the, it's usually a very short two or three word quantity, like

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: left knee pain, rectal pain, right upper quadrant, R-U-Q, abdominal pain.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it's just a very quick summary of why did the patient come into the ER today.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Despite the fact that it's so few words, it plays a huge role in the care of a patient.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you look at the big screens in the ER, which summarize who are the patients at what

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: beds, they have the chief complaint next to it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Chief complaints are used as criteria for enrolling patients in clinical trials.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's used as criteria for doing retrospective quality research to see how do we care for

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: patients of a particular type.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So it plays a very big role.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Unfortunately, the data that we've been getting has been crap.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that's because it was free text, and it was sufficiently high dimensional that just

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: attempting to standardize it with a big dropdown list like you see over here would have killed

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the clinical workflow, would have taken way too much time for clinicians to try to find

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the relevant one.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so it just wouldn't have been used.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that's where some very simple machine learning algorithms turn out to be really

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: valuable.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, we changed the workflow altogether.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Rather than the chief complaint being the first thing that the triage nurse assigns

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: when the patient comes in, it's the last thing.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: First the nurse takes the vital signs, patient's temperature, heart rate, blood pressure, respiratory

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: rate, and oxygen saturation.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They talk to the patient.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They write up a 10 word or 30 word note about what's going on with the patient.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And here it says, 69 year old male patient with severe intermittent right upper quadrant

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: pain, began soon after eating, also is a heavy drinker.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So quite a bit of information in that.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We take that, we use a supervised machine learning algorithm in this case to predict

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: a set of chief complaints now drawn from a standardized ontology.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We show the five most likely ones.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the clinician, in this case the nurse, could just click one of them, and it would

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: enter it into there.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We also allow the nurse to type in part of a chief complaint.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But rather than just doing a text matching to find words that match what's being typed

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in, we do a contextual autocomplete.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So we use our predictions to prioritize what's the most likely chief complaint that contains

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that sequence of characters.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that way it's way faster to enter in the relevant information.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And what we found is that over time we got much higher quality data out.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And again, this is something we'll be talking about in one of our lectures in this course.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So I just gave you a few examples of how machine learning and artificial intelligence will

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: transform the provider space.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But now I want to jump up a level and think through not how do we treat a patient today,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: but how do we think about the progression of a patient's chronic disease over a period

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of years.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It could be 10 years, 20 years.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And this question of how do we manage chronic disease is something which affects all aspects

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of the health care ecosystem.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It'll be used by providers, payers, and also by patients themselves.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So consider a patient with chronic kidney disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Chronic kidney disease, it typically only gets worse.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: You might start with the patient being healthy and then have some increased risk.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Eventually they have some kidney damage.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Over time they reach kidney failure.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And once they reach kidney failure, typically they need dialysis or a kidney transplant.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But understanding when each of these things are going to happen for patients is actually

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: really, really challenging.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Right now we have one way of trying to stage patients.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: A standard approach is known as the EGFR.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's derived predominantly from the patient's creatinine, which is a blood test result,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and their age.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it gives you a number out.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And from that number you can get some sense of where the patient is in this trajectory.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But it's really coarse grained and it's not at all predictive about when the patient is

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: going to progress to the next stage of the disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now other conditions, for example, some cancers, like I'll tell you about next, don't follow

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: that linear trajectory.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Rather, patients' conditions and the disease burden, which is what I'm showing in the y-axis

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: here, might get worse, better, worse again, better again, worse again, and so on.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And of course it's a function of the treatment for the patient and other things that are

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: going on with them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Understanding what influences how a patient's disease is going to progress and when is that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: progression going to happen could be enormously valuable for many of those different parts

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of the health care ecosystem.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One concrete example of how that type of prediction could be used would be in a type of precision

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: medicine.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Returning back to the example that I mentioned in the very beginning of today's lecture of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: multiple myeloma, which I said my mother died of, there are a large number of existing treatments

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for multiple myeloma.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And we don't really know which treatments work best for whom.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But imagine a day where we have algorithms that could take what you know about the patient

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: at one point in time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: That might include, for example, blood test results.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It might include RNA-seq, which gives you some sense of the gene expression for the

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: patient that, in this case, will be derived from a sample taken from the patient's bone

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: marrow.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: You could take that data and try to predict what would happen to a patient under two different

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: scenarios.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The blue scenario that I'm showing you here, if you give them treatment A, or this red

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: scenario here, where you give them treatment B. And of course, treatment A and treatment

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: B aren't just one-time treatments, but they're strategies.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So they're repeated treatments across time with some intervals.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And if your algorithm says that under treatment B, this is what's going to happen, then you

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: might, the clinician might think, OK, treatment B is probably the way to go here.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's going to long-term control the patient's disease burden the best.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: This is an example of a causal question, because we want to know, how do we cause a change

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in the patient's disease trajectory?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And we can try to answer this now using data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, one of the data sets that's available for you to use in your course projects

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is from the Multimyeloma Research Foundation.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's an example of a disease registry, just like the disease registry I talked to you

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: about earlier for rheumatoid arthritis.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it follows about 1,000 patients across time, patients who have multiple myeloma,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: what treatments they're getting, what their symptoms are, and at a couple of different

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: stages, very detailed biological data about their cancer, in this case, RNA-Seq.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one could attempt to use that data to learn models to make predictions like this.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So such predictions are fraught with errors.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one of the things that Pete and I will be teaching you in this course is that there's

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: a very big difference between prediction and prediction for the purpose of making causal

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: statements.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And the way that you interpret the data that you have when your goal is to do treatment

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: suggestion or optimization is going to be very different from what you were taught in

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the introductory machine learning algorithms class.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So other ways that we could try to treat and manage patients with chronic disease include

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: early diagnosis, for example, of patients with Alzheimer's disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: There's been some really interesting results just in the last few years here.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Or new modalities altogether, for example, liquid biopsies that are able to do early

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: diagnosis of cancer even without having to do a biopsy of the cancer tumor itself.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We could also think about how do we better track and measure chronic disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One example shown on the left here is from Dina Khatabi's lab here at MIT and CSAIL,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: where they've developed a system called Amarode, which is using wireless signals, the same

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: wireless signals that we have in this room today, to try to track patients.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And they can actually see behind walls, which is quite impressive.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So using this wireless signal, you could install what looks like just a regular wireless router

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in an elderly person's home.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And you could detect if that elderly patient falls.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And of course, if the patient has fallen and they're elderly, it might be very hard for

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: them to get back up.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They might have broken a hip, for example.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one could then alert the caregivers, maybe if necessary, bring in emergency support.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that could have a long-term outcome for this patient, which could really help them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this is an example of what I mean by better tracking chronic patients with chronic disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Another example comes for patients who have type 1 diabetes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Type 1 diabetes, as opposed to type 2 diabetes, generally develops in patients at a very early

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: age.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Usually, as children, it's diagnosed.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And one is typically managed by having a insulin pump, which is attached to a patient and can

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: give injections of insulin on the fly as necessary.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But there's a really challenging control problem there.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you give the patient too much insulin, you could kill them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you give them too little insulin, you could really hurt them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And how much insulin you give them is going to be a function of their activity.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It's going to be a function of what food they're eating and various other factors.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So this is a question which the control theory community has been thinking through for a

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: number of years.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And there are a number of sophisticated algorithms that are present in today's products.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I wouldn't be surprised if one or two people in the room today have one of these.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But it also presents a really interesting opportunity for machine learning.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Because right now, we're not doing a very good job at predicting future glucose levels,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: which is essential for figuring out how to regulate insulin.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And if we had algorithms that could, for example, take a patient's phone, take a picture of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the food that a patient is eating, have that automatically feed into an algorithm that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: predicts its caloric content and how quickly that'll be processed by the body, and then,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: as a result of that, think about when, based on this patient's metabolic system, when should

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: you start increasing insulin levels and by how much.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: That could have a huge impact on quality of life of these types of patients.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So finally, we've talked a lot about how do we manage health care, but equally important

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is about discovery.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So the same data that we could use to try to change the way that algorithms are implemented

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: could be used to think through what would be new treatments and make new discoveries

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: about disease subtypes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So at one point later in the semester, we'll be talking about disease progression modeling,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and we'll talk about how to use data-driven approaches to discover different subtypes

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And on the left here, I'm showing an example of a really nice study from back in 2008 that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: used a k-means clustering algorithm to discover subtypes of asthma.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: One could also use machine learning to try to make discoveries about what proteins, for

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: example, are important in regulating disease, how could we differentiate at a biological

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: level which patients will progress quickly, which patients will respond to treatment.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that, of course, will then suggest new ways of new drug targets for new pharmaceutical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: efforts.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Another direction also studied here at MIT by quite a few labs, actually, has to do with

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: drug creation or discovery.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So one could use machine learning algorithms to try to predict what would a good antibody

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: be for trying to bind with a particular target.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So that's all for my overview.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And in the remaining 20 minutes, I'm going to tell you a little bit about what's unique

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: about machine learning in health care, and then an overview of the class syllabus.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And I do see that it says replace lamp in six minutes or power will turn off and go

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: into standby mode.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But we have that one, right?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: That's it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Ah, OK.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Good.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: You're hired.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you didn't get into the class, talk to me afterwards.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: All right.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: You'll just stick to your defenses.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We hope.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So what's unique about machine learning in health care?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I gave you already some hints at this.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So first, health care is ultimately, unfortunately, about life or death decisions.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So we need robust algorithms that don't screw up.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: A prime example of this, which I'll tell you a little bit more about towards the end of

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the semester, is from a major software error that occurred something like 20, 30 years

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: ago in an x-ray type device, where an overwhelming amount of radiation was exposed to a patient

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: just because of a software overflow problem, a bug.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And of course, that resulted in a number of patients dying.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So that was a software error from decades ago, where there was no machine learning in

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the loop.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And as a result of that and similar types of disasters, including in the space industry

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and airplanes and so on, led to a whole area of research in computer science in formal

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: methods.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And how do we design computer algorithms that can check that a piece of software would do

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: what it's supposed to do and that there are no bugs in it?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But now that we're going to start to bring data and machine learning algorithms into

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the picture, we are really suffering from a lack of good tools for doing similar formal

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: checking of our algorithms and their behavior.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so this is going to be really important in the future decade as machine learning gets

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: deployed not just in settings like health care, but also in other settings of life and

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: death, such as in autonomous driving.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And it's something that we'll touch on throughout the semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, when one deploys machine learning algorithms, we need to be thinking about,

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are they safe?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But also, how do we check for safety long term?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: What are checks and balances that we should put into the deployment of the algorithm to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: make sure that it's still working as it was intended?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We also need fair and accountable algorithms, because increasingly, machine learning results

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are being used to drive resources in a health care setting.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: An example that I'll discuss in about a week and a half when we talk about risk stratification

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is that algorithms are being used by payers to risk stratify patients, for example, to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: figure out which patients are likely to be readmitted to the hospital in the next 30

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: days, are likely to have undiagnosed diabetes, are likely to progress quickly in their diabetes.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And based on those predictions, they're doing a number of interventions.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, they might send nurses to the patient's home.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They might offer their members access to a weight loss program.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And each of these interventions has money associated to them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: They have a cost.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so you can't do them for everyone.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so one uses machine learning algorithms to prioritize, who do you give those interventions

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But because health is so intimately tied to socioeconomic status, one could think about

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: what happens if these algorithms are not fair.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: It could have really long-term implications for our society, and something that we're

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: going to talk about later in the semester as well.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now I mentioned earlier that many of the questions that we need to study in this field don't

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: have good label data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In cases where we know what we want to predict, it's a supervised prediction problem, often

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: we just don't have labels for that thing we want to predict.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But in also many situations, we're not interested in just predicting something.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We're interested in discovery.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, when I talk about disease subtyping or disease progression, it's much

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: harder to quantify what you're looking for.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so unsupervised learning algorithms are going to be really important for what we do.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And finally, I already mentioned how many of the questions we want to answer are causal

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in nature, particularly when you want to think about treatment strategies.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So we'll have two lectures on causal inference, and we'll have two lectures on reinforcement

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: learning, which is increasingly being used to learn treatment policies in health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So all of these different problems that we've talked about result in our having to rethink

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: how do we do machine learning in this setting.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: For example, because driving labels for supervised prediction is very hard, one has to think

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: through how can we automatically build algorithms to do what's called electronic phenotyping

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to figure out automatically what is the relevant labels for a set of patients that one could

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: then attempt to predict in the future.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Because we often have very little data, for example, some rare diseases, there might only

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: be a few hundred or a few thousand people in the nation that have that disease.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Some common diseases present in very diverse ways and thus, in essence, are very rare.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Because of that, you have just a small number of patient samples that you could get even

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: if you had all of the data in the right place.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so we need to think through how can we bring together domain knowledge?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: How can we bring together data from other areas?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Everyone look over here now.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: From other areas, other diseases, in order to learn something that then we could refine

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: for the foreground question of interest.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Finally, there's a ton of missing data in health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So raise your hand if you've only been seeing your current primary care physician for less

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: than four years.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Okay.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Now, this was an easy guess because all of you are students and you probably don't live

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: in Boston.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But here in the US, even after you graduate, you go out into the world, you have a job

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and that job pays your health insurance.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Then, you know what?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Most of you are going to go into the tech industry and most of you are going to switch

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: jobs every four years.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so your health insurance is going to change every four years.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And unfortunately, data doesn't tend to follow people when you change providers or payers.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: What that means is for any one thing we might want to study, we tend to not have very good

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: longitudinal data on those individuals, at least not here in the United States.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: That story is a little bit different in other places like the UK or Israel, for example.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Moreover, we also have a very bad lens on that health care data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So even if you've been going to the same doctor for a while, we tend to only have data on

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: you when something's been recorded.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So if you went to a doctor, you had a lab test performed, we know the results of it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: If you never got your glucose tested, it's very hard, though not impossible, to figure

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: out if you might be diabetic.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So thinking about how do we deal with the fact that there's a large amount of missing

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: data, where that missing data has very different patterns across patients, and where there

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: might be a big difference between train and test distributions is going to be a major

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: part of what we discussed in this course.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And finally, the last example is censoring.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I think I've said finally a few times.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So censoring, which we'll talk about in two weeks, is what happens when you have data

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: only for small windows of time.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So for example, you have a data set where your goal is to predict survival.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So you want to know how long until a person dies, but you only have data on them up to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: January 2009, and they haven't yet died by January 2009.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Then that individual is censored.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: You don't know when they died.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So that doesn't mean you should throw away that data point.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: In fact, we'll talk about learning algorithms that can learn from censored data very effectively.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So there are a number of also logistical challenges to doing machine learning in health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: I talked about how having access to data is so important, but one of the reasons, there

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: are others, for why getting large amounts of data in the public domain is challenging

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: is because it's so sensitive.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And removing identifiers, like name and social, from data which includes free text notes can

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: be very challenging.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And as a result, when we do research here at MIT, typically it takes us anywhere from

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: a few months, which has never happened, to two years, which is the usual situation, to

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: negotiate a data sharing agreement to get the health data to MIT to do research on.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And of course, then my students write code, which we're very happy to open source under

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: MIT license, but that code is completely useless because no one can reproduce our results on

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: the same data because they don't have access to it.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So that's a major challenge to this field.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Another challenge is about the difficulty in deploying machine learning algorithms due

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: to the challenge of integration.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So you build a good algorithm.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: You want to deploy it at your favorite hospital.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: But guess what?

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Your hospital has Epic or Cerner or Athena or some other commercial electronic medical

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: record system.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that electronic medical record system is not built for your algorithm to plug into.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So there's a big gap, a large amount of difficulty to getting your algorithms into production

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: systems, which we'll talk about as well during the semester.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: The goals that Pete and I have for you are as follows.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We want you to get intuition for working with health care data.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: So the next two lectures after today are going to focus on what health care is really like

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: and what is the health care data that's created by the practice of health care like.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: We want you to get intuition for how to formalize machine learning challenges as health care

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: problems.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And that formalization step is often the most tricky and something that you'll spend a lot

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: of time thinking through as part of your problem sets.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: Not all machine learning algorithms are equally useful.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And so one theme that I'll return to throughout the semester is that despite the fact that

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: deep learning is good for many speech recognition and computer vision problems, it actually

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: isn't the best match to many problems in health care.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And you'll explore that also as part of your problem sets or at least one of them.

chunks.title: Lecture 1 What Makes Healthcare Unique
chunks.text: And we want you to understand also the subtleties in robustly and safely deploying machine learning
